newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Datacraft wins US$3 mln China telecom deal.
newsitem.headline: Datacraft wins US$3 mln China telecom deal.

text.p: Datacraft Asia Ltd said on Thursday it had won a US$3 million contract from the telecommunications authority of Sichuan province, China.
A statement said the contract was awarded to its subsidiary Datacraft China to design, build and maintain a high-speed digital data network linking the cities throughout the province.
Datacraft China has won more than 30 major contracts to build communication networks for Chinese provinces and cities, the statement said.
